description:
Data was generated from case metadata information from the GDC active archive release 12 in July 2018. 
More details: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Data/Release_Notes/Data_Release_Notes/#data-release-120

fields.description: GDC file identifier. This is a duplicate of file_gdc_id field found in some tables.
fields.name: file_id

fields.description: DbGaP accession number for the program
fields.name: project__program__dbgap_accession_number

fields.description: Program Short Name with Project Short Name
fields.name: project__project_id

fields.description: This can be used to identify a corresponding entry in the submitter's records. The GDC requires that submitter_id be unique for each entity within a project: the tuple (combination) of [ project_id, submitter_id ] is a unique key.
fields.name: submitter_id

fields.description: Total number of files for this case in the GDC legacy archive
fields.name: legacy_file_count

fields.description: Active File Count for this case
fields.name: active_file_count
